hero.title: Professional Cleaning You Can Trust
hero.subtitle: Experience the difference of premium cleaning services. Our trained professionals use eco-friendly products and proven methods to make your space shine. Residential and commercial cleaning with 100% satisfaction guarantee.

items.name: Standard House Cleaning
items.description: Complete cleaning of all rooms: dusting, vacuuming, mopping, bathrooms, kitchen. Perfect for regular maintenance.

items.name: Deep Cleaning
items.description: Thorough top-to-bottom cleaning including baseboards, inside appliances, windows, and hard-to-reach areas.

items.name: Move In/Out Cleaning
items.description: Make your old or new home pristine. Includes deep cleaning of all areas, inside cabinets, and appliances.

items.name: Post-Construction Cleaning
items.description: Remove dust, debris, and construction residue. Get your newly renovated space move-in ready.

items.name: Office Cleaning
items.description: Daily or weekly cleaning for offices: desks, common areas, restrooms, break rooms, and trash removal.

items.name: Retail Store Cleaning
items.description: Keep your storefront spotless: floors, displays, windows, restrooms, and customer areas.

items.name: Medical Office Cleaning
items.description: Specialized cleaning for medical facilities with hospital-grade disinfectants and OSHA compliance.

items.name: Restaurant Cleaning
items.description: Complete kitchen and dining area cleaning: grease removal, sanitization, and health code compliance.

items.name: Carpet Cleaning
items.description: Professional steam cleaning removes stains, odors, and allergens. Fast drying time.

items.name: Window Cleaning
items.description: Inside and outside window cleaning for sparkling, streak-free results.

items.name: Upholstery Cleaning
items.description: Refresh your furniture with professional upholstery cleaning. Safe for all fabrics.

items.name: Green Cleaning Package
items.description: 100% eco-friendly products and methods. Perfect for sensitive individuals and families with children.

items.name: Interior Windows
items.description: Add interior window cleaning to any package

items.name: Interior Fridge
items.description: Deep clean inside your refrigerator

items.name: Inside Oven
items.description: Remove baked-on grease and grime

items.name: Laundry Service
items.description: Wash, dry, and fold laundry (per load)

about.title: About Sparkle Elite
about.body: Since 2016, Sparkle Elite has been providing premium cleaning services to homes and businesses throughout the region. Our team of trained professionals takes pride in delivering exceptional results using eco-friendly products and proven cleaning methods. We're fully insured, background-checked, and committed to your complete satisfaction.

items.description: Monthly deep cleaning for thorough maintenance
From grease buildup to sparkling clean
Complete transformation with attention to detail
Deep cleaned and sanitized to perfection

items.text: Sparkle Elite has been cleaning our home for over a year and they're fantastic! Always on time, thorough, and trustworthy. Our house has never looked better. Highly recommend!
items.author: Jennifer Park

items.text: We use Sparkle Elite for our office cleaning and couldn't be happier. The team is professional, reliable, and our workspace always looks immaculate. Great value!
items.author: Michael Chen

items.text: Their deep cleaning service is incredible! They cleaned areas I didn't even know needed attention. The eco-friendly products are a huge plus for our family with young kids.
items.author: Sarah Martinez

members.name: Maria Rodriguez
members.title: Owner & Lead Supervisor
members.bio: With 12 years in the cleaning industry, Maria founded Sparkle Elite with a vision for premium, eco-friendly cleaning services. She personally trains all team members and ensures quality control.

members.name: James Wilson
members.title: Operations Manager
members.bio: James oversees scheduling, quality assurance, and client relations. His attention to detail ensures every cleaning meets our high standards.

members.name: Lisa Chen
members.title: Commercial Services Lead
members.bio: Lisa specializes in commercial cleaning and trains our commercial teams. She ensures compliance with industry standards and client specifications.

items.question: Do I need to provide cleaning supplies?
items.answer: No! We bring all necessary supplies and equipment. We use professional-grade, eco-friendly products. If you prefer us to use your specific products, we're happy to accommodate.

items.question: Do I need to be home during the cleaning?
items.answer: Not at all! Many clients provide us with a key or access code. Our team is fully background-checked and insured. You can go about your day while we clean.

items.question: What if I'm not satisfied with the cleaning?
items.answer: We have a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you're not happy with any aspect of the cleaning, let us know within 24 hours and we'll return to fix it at no charge.

items.question: How long does a cleaning take?
items.answer: It depends on the size of your space and service type. Standard cleanings typically take 2-3 hours, while deep cleanings can take 4-6 hours. We'll provide an estimate when you book.

items.question: Are your cleaners background-checked?
items.answer: Yes! All team members undergo thorough background checks, reference verification, and professional training before joining our team.

items.question: Do you offer same-day service?
items.answer: Yes, when available! Call us to check same-day availability. We recommend booking in advance for guaranteed scheduling.

items.question: What areas do you service?
items.answer: We service the entire metro area and surrounding suburbs. Check our service areas section or call to confirm we service your location.

items.question: Do you clean on weekends?
items.answer: Yes! We offer cleaning services 7 days a week to accommodate your schedule. Weekend bookings are popular, so book early!
